name: Catacombs of Trayah
description:
A gray scale dungeon crawler you can play with your mouse or your finger. Collect three orbs to reclaim the throne of Castle Trayah from the Lich Lord. Face dangerous monsters and collect fabulous treasure. Made for the microStudio Jam  #3

Theme: The number 3.

This is incorporated by requiring the collection of 3 orbs, the number three coming up repeatedly in the story, starting with 3 hp, and Trayah is Sanskrit for the number three.

Special Thanks to Gilles for making microStudio and the amazing community and microstudio.dev for helping me along the way.

Additional thanks to Burt at Bit by Bit sound for creating the background music and @frozenfractal for creating the jfxr tool I used to make my sounds.

Thanks to Mrboi for making the timer code, tinkersmith for creating the sprite button code and mythril for the intInRange code. I have learned so much from all of you.
